meanings.definition: The two bones forming the upper jaw in vertebrates.
meanings.sent1: The premaxillas help hold the teeth in place.
meanings.sent2: The dentist examined the premaxillas during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The premaxillas decided to throw a party for the molars.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as strong as premaxillas, never wavering.
meanings.sent5: The premaxillas looked like tiny bridges in the x-ray.

meanings.definition: The anterior part of the upper jaw in vertebrates.
meanings.sent1: The premaxillas are essential for eating and speaking.
meanings.sent2: The premaxillas of the fish were studied by the biologist.
meanings.sent3: The premaxillas were the first to greet the incoming food.
meanings.sent4: His words hit her like a sharp premaxillas, piercing through her defenses.
meanings.sent5: The premaxillas of the dinosaur were massive and powerful.
